name: Punch A Random Guy
description:
Have you ever wanted to punch a random, innocent 2D man? Well today is your lucky day because that's what you do in this game made for the 20 Second Game Jam 2022.

Now, this whole game isn't exactly 20 seconds as each ending in the game is 20 seconds respectively (there is 2 endings and 13 secrets, maybe you could get' em all!)

Here is a link to the 20 Second Game Jam:

https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam
